mapper.insert: insert into tbl_highfive (receiver, sender, hiFlag ) values (#{receiver},#{sender},#{hiFlag})
mapper.select: select hno, receiver, sender, hiFlag, senddate from tbl_highfive where hno=#{hno}
select h.hno, h.receiver, h.sender, h.hiFlag, h.senddate from tbl_highfive as h and tbl_user as u on h.receiver=u.uid where hno > 0 order by h.hno desc, h.hiFlag
